mapper.select: SELECT ${group}, median_value FROM ( SELECT ${group}, ${aggregate} AS median_value, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ${group} ORDER BY ${aggregate}) AS rnk, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY ${group}) AS cnt FROM ${table} GROUP BY ${group}, ${aggregate} ) t WHERE rnk IN ((cnt + 1) / 2, (cnt + 2) / 2)
